inn1.comm: gets good bounce and carry outside off, Marsh does well to shoulder arms
nice way to get off the mark, Mortaza swings it into the pads and he tucks it away past square leg, the ball slows down close to the boundary
hits a good length outside off and the ball climbs on him, he gets his elbows high and punches to point
pitches around the off stump, he gets nicely behind the line and defends
moves across his stumps and turns it down to midwicket, Hopes sets off but Marsh sends him back
gets a bit of extra bounce and cramps Hopes for room as he tries to cut
not the best of starts for Shahadat, he doesn't control the movement into the left hander and strays onto his pads, the ball clips the base of the pad and rolls away to fine leg
much better, fires in the inswinging yorker on off stump and Marsh taps it back to the bowler off the toe edge of the bat
he oversteps this time and the result isn't too good, he strays on the pads again and the ball clips the pad and beats the keeper
Free Hit loops it outside the off stump and the ball lands on a yorker length outside off, he makes room but can only heave it down to midwicket
Shahadat really grunts as he delivers that, lands on a good length outside off and Marsh pats it down to the bowler
he lets out another Sharapova grunt as he delivers that one outside off, he opens the face of the bat and angles it just wide of point
short of a length and straying towards the body, Hopes pulls but doesn't time it as well as he would've liked, he manages to place it wide of midwicket though
pitches on  a good length on off and middle, he pushes it back to the bowler
gets a bit of bounce outside off, he gets his elbows high and cuts it down to third man who's quite square
comes over the wicket to Marsh and nearly claims the wicket, it lands on off stumps and gets a bit of movement away, how did that miss the outside edge?
away movement again but he lands this slightly wide outside off, Marsh safely lets it go
almost a repeat of the previous ball, safely negotiated again by Marsh
pitches on middle stump and Marsh gets in position early to tuck it away past midwicket with the swing, not a bad over in the end
Gets forward and pushes it in front of mid-on and calls for the run quickly, good running
He oversteps again, pitches outside off and gets a lot of bounce, he hangs his bat out and uppishly places it wide of the vacant gully region
Free Hit And again he fails to put it away, backs away to a full delivery and the ball just dips before reaching mid-on who's right at the edge of the circle
gets forward and the inside edge nearly trickles onto the stumps, the ball rolls to fine leg
shot! He bangs it in short of a length on middle and leg, Hopes picks the length early, swivels and pulls hard along the ground wide of square leg, that's the first boundary today off the bat
left alone outside off
bang! He bangs it in short again and Hopes repeats the earlier shot, he picks the length early and pulls it over midwicket, more elevation this time before reaching the boundary
shoulders arms outside off
gets good away movement, he gets on the front foot before letting it go
just drifts wide outside off, he shoulders arms
same result again, he angles it across the left hander and he lets it go
pitches on a fullish length outside off, he shoulders arms
hits a good length outside off, he lets this one go
starts off with a good length delivery outside off, he pushes it to the off side
Hopes is solid in defense as he gets forward to push it back to the bowler
holds the length back outside off, Hopes is strong on the pull but it's only a single to fine leg
taps it softly in front of mid-off and sets off quickly for the run, Shahadat has a shy at the stumps and hits but it's a little too late
Hopes leans forward for a booming drive but mistimes it, the ball rolls on the pitch back to the bowler
Hopes gets in position early to whip it over midwicket but he mistimes it a little and yet manages to beat the fielder, Hopes will latch onto anything drifting onto his body
gets forward and taps it just wide of mid-off, a sliding save restricts that to a single
pushes it down towards cover with very soft hands and calls quickly, good running
another example of excellent running and calling from these two, Marsh goes on the back foot and taps it softly besides the vacant silly point region and calls immediately
gets across his stumps and works it to the on side
holds the length back outside off, he gets across his stumps and tries to set off for another quick single after pushing it towards mid-on, Marsh sends him back
gets forward and punches it off the full face of the bat past cover
goes for a wild cut without moving his feet and gets a thick under edge through to the keeper
much better, he gets behind the line this time as he pushes it down to mid-off
slightly shorter in length outside off, he stays at the crease and punches it hard to short cover
poor delivery but he gets away with it, full and wide outside off and deserving of a booming boundary but Marsh finds mid-off

where did that come from?? Brilliant delivery from Nazmul, he really gets it to kick off a good length and that fizzes past Marsh's glove, that was equally well played as Marsh dropped his hands as the ball reared up on him, best ball of the day surely
fullish outside off and he pushes it hard across the line to mid-on
trickles off his pads and he sets off for a quick single, Mehrab runs forward from midwicket and has a shy at the stumps on the dive but he misses
pitches outside off, Marsh watchfully lets it go
hits a good length outside off, Marsh shoulders arms again
superb line and length from Mortaza, it lands outside off and kicks up before reaching the keeper, well left by Marsh
gives him a bit more width and Marsh gets in position early for the cut and slices it down to third man who's fielding very square
gets behind the line and defends on the back foot
gets forward to defend but manages a thick inside edge onto his pads, the ball rolls down towards leg gully
slants it into the right hander, he gets across his stumps and works it with the angle to midwicket

fullish outside off and angling it away, Marsh gets nicely behind the line and eases it on the front foot past extra cover, Razzak covers a lot of ground to get to it from deep point but makes a mess of it
fullish and wide outside off, he mistimes the drive to short cover
full and angling across the left hander, the crisply-timed drive finds mid-off
full and swinging away from him, he shoulders arms this time
just short of a length outside off, he gets his elbows high and punches it down to cover

in the air but.. the first false shot from Hopes, he tries to loft over mid-off but ends up getting a top edge which falls between backward point and third man, cries of 'catch it' but Bangladesh aren't so lucky
tucked away down to mid-on, a good save restricts that to a single
hits a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
gets across his stumps, closes the face of the bat and tucks it wide of mid-on
turns the face of the bat and works it with the angle down to square leg
pitches outside off, not much bounce before reaching the keeper
short and wide outside off and Marsh gives it the treatment with a fierce cut but there's protection at deep cover for that, Razzak mops up
short of a length outside off and punched wide of cover

excellent fielding there, Marsh leans forward to drive through the off side but gets a thick inside edge past the stumps, Tamim gives the chase from short fine leg and just pulls it back before the rope, good commitment

Bangladesh strike, very poor stroke by Hopes, he tries to pull a short delivery but gets very early on the stroke, the top edge is taken easily by Mehrab at short midwicket, Hopes makes his way back as soon as he skies the ball, he's crossed with himself
bangs it in short, Clarke ducks under it
strays too wide outside off, left alone and wide called
fullish and wide outside off, left alone
Mashrafe induces a false shot by pitching it on the corridor outside off, Marsh hangs his bat out and nearly feathers an edge
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
takes a good look at this one outside off and lets it go
pitches outside off and holds its line, he lets this one go as well
tucks it down towards square leg and there's a lot of hesitation in this single, Clarke stops, starts again and somehow makes it to the crease, the throw is just wide of the stumps
signs of low bounce there, that bounces twice before reaching Ghosh
better bounce this time, kicks up outside off and Clarke works it down to point
angled towards middle and leg, he closes the face of the bat and pushes it with the line to midwicket
pitches on a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and taps it down to the off side
gets his elbows high and pushes it down to cover
banged in short of a length and angling towards the body, Clarke pulls hard along the ground but finds Razzak at deep midwicket who's stationed there to limit the boundaries
pitches outside off and moves away before reaching the keeper, he shoulders arms
pitches outside off and gets it to angle across the right hander, he lets it go again
angling towards the body, he shuffles and tucks it down to midwicket
lands outside off and the away movement keeps a check on Clarke as he has to contend with another dot ball
left alone, only this one's wider outside off and Clarke looks back to gauge the movement
angled towards the body, he shuffles and tucks it behind square on the on side
pitches outside off and cramps him for room, he gets behind the line and punches it off the back foot
full on middle and leg, he pushes it down to mid-on and turns down any chance of a single
full in length outside off but Clarke can't find the gap as he pushes it straight to cover

holds the length back and that looked like a couple of runs the moment it left the bat, however an excellent save by Kapali at cover limited that to a dot ball, Ashraful was very pleased with the effort
a cracker of a pull but it nearly costs Clarke his wicket as the ball dips and just falls short of Razzak at deep square leg
slides towards the pads, he tucks it down to deep square
Appeal: Marsh looks to slog him across the line and both Shakib and Ghosh are convinced he's edged it, but umpire Saheba doesn't think so
flighted on off and middle, he works it down to deep square
comes round the wicket, he gets well forward and defends
not much turn, he stays on the back foot and taps it back to the bowler
the arm ball, he stays on the back foot and defends back to the bowler
flighted on off and middle, he stays at the crease and defends
pitches it on off and middle, cramps him for room and he has to settle for a dot ball to cover
slightly wide outside the off stump, he makes a bit of room and slices it wide of point
firmly pushes a full delivery back to the bowler and Nazmul shows aggression by taking aim at the stumps, he misses by a mile
gets a half stride forward and taps it down to cover, he's trying to break free

Clarke cuts loose this time and he gets his timing and placement right, Nazmul errs by giving him width outside off, Clarke reaches out and carves it past backward point, no chance for third man to mop up
shuffles across and tucks it softly down to mid-on, good calling and running
lunges forward and taps it down to point, thinks of a single but Marsh shoots down the idea
flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it to long-off
comes over the wicket to Marsh, he gets on his knee and sweeps to Razzak at deep square leg
steps down the track and pushes it to the on side
shot! That is fractionally short of a length outside off, Clarke stays on the back foot, waits for the turn and cuts wide of backward point

Clarke gets a little cheeky with the cut and pays the price, Shakib doesn't give him enough room to work with outside off and the ball skids through quickly, he tries to dab it down to third man, takes the outside edge and there was no doubt in the umpire's (Saheba) mind that he edged it
grunts and dishes out a yorker, he digs it out to mid-off
hits the deck hard and Marsh gets in position early for the pull, there's protection in the deep for that
hits a good length outside off and shapes away, he shoulders arms
full and wide outside off and punched very firmly to Kapali at short cover, he's had a good day in the field
bangs it in short but he mistimes the pull to deep square
tries out another short delivery and another pull is mistimed, this time it rolls off the glove to square leg
flighted on middle and leg, he steps down the track but the ball travels off the toe edge of the bat to the on side
works it with the angle behind square on the on side
drifts on the pads, he uses his wrists and works it down to fine leg
flighted down the leg side, he turns it to the on side
tossed up outside off, he lunges forward and pushes it towards cover
flighted outside off and defended back to the bowler
short of a length, Marsh thinks of pulling it but changes his mind and defends back to the bowler on seeing the ball skid through
pushed to midwicket, there's hesitation after Shakib picks it up one-handed and in one motion takes aim at the non striker's end, he misses, Shakib actually went for the wrong end
he pulls it hard down to square leg and Nazmul charges from fine leg and nearly over runs the ball, he manages to cut it off just before the rope
shortish in length, he steers it wide of gully
shot! That should make Marsh feel a lot better, it's short and drifting down leg, he pulls hard and fine leg had absolutely no chance
full in length outside off and he drives inside out to the off side
works it with th turn to short fine leg
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and angles it past short third man
stays at the crease and works it with the turn to midwicket
pushes it quicker, lands on a fulligh length and he works it down to long-on
lunges forward for a half hearted forward defense but the ball just beats the outside off
gets forward and pushes it down to cover
hits a good length on off stump and cramps him for room, he taps it back to the bowler
stays at the crease and taps it just wide of Ashraful at backward point, they pick up a quick single
holds the length back outside off and Marsh latches onto it with a pull, he gets enough elevation to clear mid-off but not enough timing to reach the boundary
slower ball outside the off stump, he angles it down to third man
gets forward and taps a good length delivery down to cover
pitches on middle and leg, he gets behind the line and defends
gets forward and pushes it with the turn to long-on to bring up the 100
gets forward and pushes it to midwicket
short of a length, he gets on the back foot and pulls to deep square leg
swept to deep square leg, the throw is wide and Ashraful isn't happy
flighted on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
flighted outside off, left alone
comes over the wicket, skids through him quickly, he gets forward and taps it towards cover
stays back at the crease and punches it back to the bowler
reaches out and gets a thick outside edge which flies past the vacant slip region, that brings up his fifty
lunges forward to drive but the ball beats him
flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it down to cover
turned away behind square leg for a single
works it this time in front of square leg
moves back and works it to deep-square leg
looks to sweep, misses it and takes the arm onto the helmet.
defended to the off side.
pushes to the off side for a single.
angles it down to third man
stays at the crease and pulls off the front foot down to deep square leg, the ball lands on the bounce
pushed back to the bowler
pitches outside off and doesn't turn, he pushes it to the off side
short of a length, he waits for it and pulls to the on side
poor ball and rightfully put away, he bowls it too short outside off, he has all the time in the world to rock on the back foot and pull over midwicket
gets forward and pushes it wide of mid-off for a couple
that beats the outside edge and the keeper, the low bounce again
flighted on middle and leg, he works it with the turn to square leg
flighted on middle and off, he pushes it with the turn to long-on
pushed in quicker on off stump, he finds cover
flighted on middle and leg, he finds midwicket
looped in on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side
flighted outside off, he finds cover this time
completes a lightning quick and tidy over with another dot ball, angled to the off side
pushed towards mid-off
gets forward and steers a full delivery down to backward point
lunges forward and pushes it down to cover
gets forward and steers it behind point
gets forward and places it wide of mid-off for another single
short of a length, he pulls it down to deep square and a good effort by Ashraful limits that to a single
the stumps are broken at the non striker's end but the batsman is home
gets down for the sweep and there's an lbw shout, that would have missed leg
stays at the crease and angles it down to short third man
attempts to pull this one but he mistimes to the on side
stays at the crease and cuts to deep backward point
flighted on middle and leg, he works it behind square on the on side
flighted outside off, he picks up  single to long-off
holds the length back outside off, he stays at the crease and punches to the off side
defended to the off side
gives him a bit of width, he rocks back and cuts to deep point
takes a couple of paces down the track and works it down to long-on
rocks back at the crease and slices it down to short third man
Marsh finds the gap! Flighted outside off, he lunges forward and adds a lot of power into the drive, enough to send it screeching past extra cover
flighted on the pads, worked to the on side
gets forward and pushes to the off side
stays at the crease, waits for the turn and punches wide of cover
stays at the crease and clips it with the turn to the on side
flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it to long-off
pitches on a good length on off and middle, he stays at the crease and taps it wide of gully
short of a length outside off, the ball comes through at a gentle pace, h swivels and pulls to square leg
fullish outside off, he gets well forward and drives to deep point
switches to a fuller length, he shows the full face of the bat and pushes it down to long-on
bangs in the bouncer and Hussey decides not play at it seeing two fielders out in the deep for the hook
shapes to drive through the off side but gets an inside edge towards long-on
the ball stops on him and he gets a leading edge down to the off side
strays wide down the leg side and that beats the keeper as well
stays at the crease and punches it to short midwicket
shuffles at the crease and turns it to the on side
strays on the on side, pushes it to deep midwicket
fires in the quicker one and strays down the leg side, it clips the pad and beats the keeper
a loss of concentration by Marsh, the ball lands outside off and turns in, he's a little late in getting his bat behind the line and the inside edge rolls onto the stumps
fullish and wide outside off, he drives wide of extra cover
tucked away behind square leg
short of a length, draws him on the back foot as he defends
driven wide of mid-on for a single
fullish outside off, defended on the front foot
stays back and taps it with soft hands to the on side, thinks of a single but changes his mind
floated outside off, he taps it down to cover
rocks back at the crease, makes room and cuts wide of point
flighted outside off, he uses the room outside off and slices it down to short third man
flighted on middle and leg, he pushes a fullish delivery down to deep midwicket
holds the length back outside off, he slices it down to short third man for a quick single
stays back at the crease and waits for the turn, chops it down towards point
pitches outside off and straightens, he taps it back to the bowler
stays at the crease and punches it down to long-on
gets back at the crease and drives to deep mid-on
gets on the back foot and punches it down to deep mid-off
pushed behind point, David Hussey turns down the single
not short enough to pull but he manages to heave it past midwicket
that one goes through straight and quick, he pushes it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he rocks back and punches to the off side
Appeal He goes for the reverse sweep and misses, Ghosh is very confident with the appeal but Peter Parker shakes his head, no conclusive proof that he edged it
pushed behind square on the on side
shapes to cut but he gets an edge down to short third man
flighted outside off, he cuts to sweeper cover
defended to the off side for a single
gets forward and pushes a fullish delivery through the line to long-off
Dropped gets forward and scoops it just over Mortaza's head at extra cover, he gets a hand to it
flighted on middle and leg, he tucks it away wide of midwicket
too short, Hussey picks the length early, rocks back and across and pulls over midwicket
makes room to carve it over extra cover but he mistimes the shot and gets an under edge past the keeper
this time he connects with the reverse sweep but he finds short third man
mistimes the cut and he ends up chopping it down towards backward point
takes a couple of paces down the track but Razzak holds the length back, he has to settle for a single down to sweeper cover
fires that down the leg side and Hussey tries to nudge it fine, Ghosh thinks he nicked it but Peter Parker doesn't feel the same
pushed back the bowler
driven wide of mid-on for a single
pushed to long-on for a single
give himself room, comes down the track and slams that flatbatted over long-off for the firts six of the match
fired in towards leg, David Hussey backs away from the stumps, tries to clear extra cover but only manages to find Mortaza, who makes up for his lapse in the  Shakib's previous over
fired in, on the stumps, defended
defended again, this is what Bangladesh need
driven to cover but no run again
pitched on a length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
slow start for Haddin, pushed to midwicket
quickish delivery, and again pushed to mid-on
drives it to long off
slightly shorter this time, and Hussey pulls it for a single
steps down the track and pushed back to the bowler
goes on the back foot and tries to cut but gets an under edge
outside off, pushed towards cover
slow start from Haddin, pushed to midwicket
defended back to the bowler
steps down the track and jabs it to midwicket
Fifty for Hussey as Kapali starts with a rank long hop. Lucky to get away with just a single behind square leg for that ball
tossed up, on a length, just outside leg, Haddin came down the track and punched it towards long-on. Fantastic running and they get two there
Haddin goes and the gamble to bring on the legspinner has worked. Haddin's bowled by a quicker delivery which beats his attempted loft. That hits the middle of middle
slides down leg side and that's a wide
worked away square on the off for a single
shorter delivery, Hussey goes down on his knee and crunches it past midwicket for four
pushed to the off side for a single
full toss on off, Hussey drives it down the ground, Raqibul rushes in from long-off to prevent thes second but he fumbles and the batsmen take two
pulled to deep midwicket, straight away the call is for two
hit to midwicket again but this time only a single
back of a length on off stump, White defends
similar length but drifting towards leg this time, White works it towards short midwicket, batsmen go for a tight single and take another on the overthrow
played to wide long-off
on a length just outside off, Hussey advances down the track and gives himself room and flays that to the point boundary
consecutive boundaries, and superbly timed this time, full toss, Hussey backs away a little and hits it to the mid-off boundary
backs away again to another full toss which is driven to long-off
yorker length delivery on middle, White digs it out to long-on
Hussey is going berserk here. Slower legspinner and Hussey comes down the pitch and scoops it straight back over the bowler for a six
not a shot to remember this time but it fetches him four runs, inside edge trickles away very fine past the keeper's right as 20 runs come off the over
given width to free his arms, White steps out and cuts it but only a single results
no-ball, that will be a free hit, Hussey drives it towards long-on
excellent delivery for the free hit, yorker on middle stump, not much that White could do with that, no run as his drive goes back to the bowler
dug out towards cover
keeps it full on middle and all Hussey can do is flog it to long-on
this is turned out to be a fantastic over. another delivery spearing into middle. Dot ball.
Another yorker and no run again as White digs it out to cover
overpitched and White crunches that towards deep midwicket. Superb running as they take three.
driven to sweeper cover for a single
that the end of Cameron White. Tries to steer it to third man exposing his stumps and the ball crashes into off stump
banged in short and Johnson's pull gets a top edge which balloons for a simple catch for the bowler
good ball, fullish just outside off, and Hussey powers it towards deep cover and they take two
three wickets in four balls for Shahadat! short of a length, Hussey advances down the pitch and tries to scoop it over cover but fails to connect and that hits his off stump

inn2.comm: Short and some width and Tamim Iqbal goes for an extravagant cut but misses
better delivery this time, he lets it go outside off
hit hard towards point but no run
back of a length, just outside off, Tamim gets on the front foot and tries to work it down the ground for a single
bit short and some width, Tamim lashes that over point, Brett Geeves makes a desperate dive at the boundary but that a four
defended on the front foot
back of a length, defended
bit of width and he lets it go through to the keeper
on the legs this time, Mehrab flicks it towards midwicket, can't beat the infield
well-directed bouncer, Mehrab is surprised but he ducks in time
just down the leg side, Mehrab leaves it again
bouncer on leg-stump line this time, Mehrab gets under it again
short of a length, in the corridor, good ball and Tamim shoulders arms
again in the channel, Tamim tries to leave it but is late and the ball flies off the bat towards third man
shorter ball on off stump, Tamim crashes that to midwicket for a boundary. He's an aggressive batsman, he won't be leaving too many deliveries
on a length and tucked away off his pads, batsmen scramble through for two.
immaculate line and length from Bracken, Tamim, though, tries to slam it down the ground, goes straight back to the bowler
defended towards cover. Mehrab is yet to get off the mark
Mehrab's gone! LBW. After feeding him a series of bouncers in the previous over, Clark pitches this one up and gets it to swing in to the left-hand batsman, raps his pads and he's gone
short and very, very wide. Ashraful chases it but doesn't connect. First ball and he goes for an extravagant shot!
much better line, closer to off and Ashraful shoulders arms this time
short and wide again, and he's getting the move to move away from the right hander here
slightly wide outside off, let through to the keeper again
works it towards the off side with soft hands, but can't get a run.
slight width, back of a length and Tamim flat bats it  past the bowler for four
defended this time, much better line
slower delivery, good length, Tamim gets on the front foot and was a little early on the stroke but no harm done
another slower ball, and another down-the-ground four, that was uppish but evaded the fielder at mid-off
good length, on middle and off, defended by Tamim
short of length, in the channel, driven firmly to mid-off
slower delivery on leg stump, Ashraful plays it with soft hands, drops it in front of square on  the leg side
short delivery and wide. Tamim has shown he doesn't need a second invite for the cut and he throws his bat at it again but doesn't connect
shortish, outside off, fiercely hit again, can't beat the cover fielder though
hit on the thigh pad, Ashraful wanted a single but Tamim was on his back foot
whistles down leg, pitched on leg stump and seams more down and tahts another wide
hits it towards midwicket
Clark getting big movement off the seam, pitched on a length just outside off and jagged away from Ashraful
slower delivery, runs it down to third man
appeal for a caught behind as Ashraful tries to pull a short delivery on leg stump but that came off his pad
similar delivery, Ashraful lets it go this time
banged in short again, Ashraful pulls it behind square this time
short and outside off, Tamim attempts another flamboyant shot, and doesn't connect again
got to him quicker than he expected, inside edges it to square leg
A wristy flick to a full delivery on middle and leg
jumps and gets it behind point for a single
gives it everything again but mistimes it and it goes to mid-on
slower delivery, yorker and well dug out
hit straight to cover
this is turning out to be a good over from Clark, good length on off and he defends it
goes for the drive, and it takes the outside edge and runs away to third man
slower ball, back of a length, on off and he defends it square on the off

Tamim falls, holing out to third man, that was short of a length but there wasn't enough room to cut. Tamim went for the cut anyway, but didn't get hold of it and Brett Geeves takes a fine catch at third man
short, quick delivery on middle, batsmen watches it sail through to the keeper
just outside off and the batsman is beaten
shortish, angling away from the right hander and he lets it go to the keeper
similar delivery but slightly wider, the batsman isn't tempted to go for a shot
same length but on the stumps this time and the batsman defends it down the ground
Clark gets the outside edge again, and it flies to backward point
back of a length, on off, and worked away towards square leg
full delivery, on the stumps, defended
shorter this time, on off, Ashraful walks across and defends it to the on side
runs it down to third man
short ball on middle, pulled to midwicket, direct hit from Mitchell Johnson and the batsmen take another run off the richochet
tempts him with width outside off and Ashraful nearly falls for the bait, withdraws the cut

plumb in front and Bangladesh sink deeper, Johnson bangs it in back of a length and Ashraful eyes the deep square leg boundary, unfortunately he misjudges the lower bounce and is trapped right in front of middle, Peter Parker raises the finger, Ashraful was right in going for the pull but he played too early
bangs it in short outside off and Shakib lets that fizz past him
gets it tn angle in to the left hander and Shakib turns the face of the bat and clips it wide of midwicket for a single
gets a bit of width outside off but fails to execute the drive properly as he mistimes it to the off side
Raqibul taps it wide of the bowler with soft hands, calls quickly and sets off for a single, good running
comes round the wicket, floats it around leg stump, he gets on his knee and paddles it to fine leg
stays on the back foot, waits for the turn and clips it to midwicket
takes a couple of paces down the track but checks his shot to point
waits patiently at the crease and softly taps it down to the on side
flighted outside off, he taps it down to point
flighted on middle and off, he gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Raqibul pushes it towards Clarke at backward point but turns down the single
plays very close to the body as he clips it away behind square on the on side
gets a nasty lifter from Johnson that kicks up off a good length and raps him on the gloves, he fends it off pretty well in the end
Appeal Johnson gets some steep bounce down the leg side and it appeared as if the ball clipped something before reaching Haddin, Parker shakes his head, replays showed the ball hitting the shirt
hits a good length outside off, he pushes it towards cover
strays towards the body and Shakib works it past the keeper to keep the strike
risky but Bangladesh will take it, Shakib steps down the track to a flighted delivery and just clears Geeves' reach at mid-on, Geeves was a couple of yards in front of the circle
goes for a wild slog sweep and misses it completely
Shakib refuses to back down as he attempts a pull this time and mistimes it to the on side
flighted outside off, he pushes it down to the off side
flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it down to long-off

he had it coming, Shakib steps down the track to cart Clarke over long-on but makes a mess of a low full toss, he turns the face of the bat too early and the leading edge lobs to Stuart Clark at mid-off
pitches outside off, he shoulders arms
pitches outside off, he taps it down to the off side
hits a good length outside off, he gets off the mark with a tap down to point
softens him up with a bouncer that sails past his helmet, he sways away at the right moment
bangs it in short and tempts him to go for the slash over third man, not too far from the edge
the slower ball this time, he drives and gets an outside edge to the slips
swings it in to the right hander and he whips it to mid-on
hits a good length outside off, he pushes it down to point
lovely shot, that was fractionally short of a length outside off, Kapali got his elbows high and punched it wide of the packed off side field down to the deep extra cover boundary
drifts in to him and he turns it to wide mid-on
pitches outside off and holds its line, he shoulders arms
pitches outside the off stumps and seams away, he shoulders arms
hits a nice length outside the off stump, he gets behind the line and defends
hits the same length around the off stump and gets this one to drift in a little, defended on the back foot
generates a lot more pace and bounce, he goes for the upper cut but misses
back of a length, punched off the back foot and timed superbly, the placement is good enough to beat cover, Clarke pulls it back before the rope but the ball rolls back and hits it
good length outside off, pushed to the off side
short and slightly wide outside off, Kapali nearly falls for the bait again, this is the second upper cut that has failed to make contact in this over
hits a good length on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side
hits a good length on middle and leg, he gets behind the line and defends
drifts wide outside off, he thinks of chasing it but changes his mind
hits a good length outside off, keeps a little low before reaching the keeper
pitches outside off, he drives to mid-off
slides towards the pads, he clips it away to square leg
cuts the pace off the ball and he turns it to midwicket this time
Geeves persists with the short of length delivery which kicks up, Haddin has to leap to collect that
and this one shoots through low outside off, two-paced surface this, luckily it didn't cost Kapali his wicket
fuller in length and angled down to point
full outside off, he shapes to drive through the covers but gets an inside edge to the on side
hits a good length outside off and gets it to nip back in, he gets behind the line and taps it away
gives him just a bit of width outside off and he executes the punched drive well, beats mid-off
Haddin stands up to the stumps, Raqibul gets forward to a full delivery and pushes it to the off side

a direct hit sends him packing, Raqibul lunged forward and chips it in the air towards mid-on, there are cries for a catch but the ball falls well short, the batsmen set off for a run that should never have been taken, Kapali struggles to make his ground and Clark's aim from mid-on is spot on
gets across the right hander, he lets it go
hits a good length outside off, he lets it go
full and wide outside off, he chips it uppishly towards point
hits a good length outside off, he punches it down to mid-off
gives him a bit of width outside off, he plays a punchy drive towards cover
tries to bounce him out outside the off stump, he shoulders arms
pitches outside off and this keeps a little low, he shoulders arms
gets forward and drives uppishly down to extra cover
good length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
drifts towards the body, he nudges it with the angle down to fine leg
pitches outside off and holds its line, punched to the off side
the off cutter, he stays at the crease and the outside edge runs down to third man
stays at the crease and steers it down to point
good length outside off, cramps him for room and he settles to defend this on the back foot
sees the width and slashes it just over the reach of gully, risky shot
another slower ball, he plays the cover drive too early and the ball nearly takes the outside edge
First wicket in international cricket for Brett Geeves. Shortish delivery but excellent line just outside off and Dhiman Ghosh fishes at it giving Haddin a simple catch
short ball aimed at the Razzak's body. He manages to get it away to the leg side
tight line outside off, left alone by the batsman
shorter this time but same line, Raqibul jumps and defends it
on the stumps this time, defended back to the bowler
yorker on middle, Raqibul just about manages to dig it out
back of a length, slightly wide outside off, Razzak pokes at it and is beaten
fuller delivery, just outside off, Razzak punches it to the leg side
Dropped! slower delivery, length and and a little wide outside off, Razzak tries to smash it to the leg side and David Hussey misses a difficult chance
bit of room outside off and dabbed down to third man
slower ball, on a length angling across the right hander, defended by the batman square on the off
good length, outside off and left alone
full delivery this time, hit towards cover
attempted drive, mistimed to the leg side
Another wicket for Geeves. Short and lifting towards Raqibul's helmet. He tries to fend it off, it takes the shoulder of the bat and flies to David Hussey at second slip
superb yorker on off first up, the batsman manages to survive though
shortish and outside off, Mortaza sways exaggeratedly out of the way
Cameron White tosses it up, flicked to midwicket
tossed up again, worked away to short fine leg
good line and length, driven firmly back and White makes  a superb diving stop
flighted again, bit of width, driven to cover
Bangladesh are unravelling fast here. Razzak closed the face too soon as he tried to flick him to leg and the ball pops up for a simple caught and bowled
short and the batsman gives himself and fends it away  through the vacant fourth slip region
quick, outside off and the batsman is beaten
on a length, bit of width, gets the edge but bounces before reaching Haddin, who makes a collects it well
pushed to cover
on middle and off, again pushed to the off side, no run.
slips in the bouncer to finish the over. The batsman sees that coming and gets out of the way well in time
back of a length, cut to cover
Another wicket for White. Tossed up on a good length outside off, Nazmul goes for the drive and gets the outside edge giving a regulation catch to Michael Clarke
on the leg stump and he is hit on the pads

White gets three as Bangladesh slump to their lowest score ever. Shortish delivery outside off, tried to cut it, gets the bottom edge, ricochets off Haddin's thigh and Clarke dives forward from first slip to snaffle it inches from the ground and seal the win
